Respectable community,

We are happy to offer you newest addition to our XenStorage plans.

VPS shaped to provide you decent storage, sufficient ram and guaranteed resources.

 

Service is hosted on Dual E5 2620 with 128 GB. Disk setup is consisting of 8 drives RAID 6 array.

 

Provisioning is manual after completed fraud check so you will wait for your server a little bit.
